description: ES: Returns information about all the data pages that are currently in the SQL Server buffer pool.
body:
/* Returns information about all the data pages that are currently in the SQL Server buffer pool. */
SELECT
    ObjectSchemaName = '.All'
   ,ObjectName       = '.All'
   ,CachedPagesCount = FORMAT(COUNT(*), '#,##0')
   ,IndexName        = '.All'
FROM
    sys.dm_os_buffer_descriptors
WHERE
    database_id = DB_ID()
UNION ALL
SELECT
    ObjectSchemaName = obj.ObjectSchemaName
   ,ObjectName       = obj.ObjectName
   ,CachedPagesCount = FORMAT(COUNT(*), '#,##0')
   ,IndexName        = i.name
FROM
    sys.dm_os_buffer_descriptors AS bd
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT
            p.object_id
           ,ObjectName       = OBJECT_NAME(p.object_id)
           ,ObjectSchemaName = OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(p.object_id)
           ,p.index_id
           ,au.allocation_unit_id
        FROM
            sys.allocation_units      AS au
            INNER JOIN sys.partitions AS p
                ON au.container_id = p.hobt_id
                AND (au.type       = 1 OR au.type = 3)
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
            p.object_id
           ,ObjectName       = OBJECT_NAME(p.object_id)
           ,ObjectSchemaName = OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(p.object_id)
           ,p.index_id
           ,au.allocation_unit_id
        FROM
            sys.allocation_units      AS au
            INNER JOIN sys.partitions AS p
                ON au.container_id = p.partition_id
                AND au.type        = 2
    )                            AS obj
        ON bd.allocation_unit_id = obj.allocation_unit_id
    LEFT JOIN sys.indexes        AS i
        ON obj.object_id         = i.object_id
        AND obj.index_id         = i.index_id
WHERE
    bd.database_id = DB_ID()
AND obj.ObjectSchemaName NOT IN (N'sys') /* Remove this to see system objects and user objects */
GROUP BY
    obj.ObjectName
   ,obj.ObjectSchemaName
   ,i.name
ORDER BY
    ObjectSchemaName ASC
   ,ObjectName ASC;
